body: Ciao Giuseppe, I managed to solve your problem by adding a name creation routine (see the red group components in the picture): this allows for the recognition of all the zones you are feeding in the solve adjacency component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Flg-lHiuL4fQFHpedkpNa*pvqceY-YMbY608je*kq8MgUBaq4nluasti*XtmMdm1SNcfyp9vhK-ZkJ1dWD53I831UnrM-dXP/Canvasat102023.png) The goup I added [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Flg-lHiuL4eB38I45x304cYMVzqfmP5VTeaah55AG00n96rvVgwUNMTjbvgMk-lmzweRsyWpMR4Kep3huSf1*YV0Z*BoqhGs/Canvasat102055.png) The adjacency component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Flg-lHiuL4c0Fxxfm6IHDj6xEoh0PBrUIFoKxTMkZ7jGWSBVlY149nuBkQ0KoIg9IdaHsA3aqMZ2svrFgFPVZWmVDTYZZEl-/Eplus_model_JS.jpg) All the floors recognized. Here is the GH definition. Hope this helps you.
